summary: Bloody combat enhancement mod. Decorate battlefield with your enemies brains, limbs and intestines, its here.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/2598850-1361226322.gif[/img][/center]

[size=15][color=red] Warning: this mod contains excessive violence and gore.[/color] [/size]

[size=5][color=yellow] New version 1.0 is avalible[/color] [/size]

[Center][youtube]_qhZAZxFDjE[/youtube][youtube]FQC9Rmtw0PY[/youtube][/center]
[center][youtube]iaDA_GCSSDI[/youtube][youtube]kXoVeTe-mns[/youtube][/center]
[right]Starts at 13.00                  [/right]

[size=3][b]Introduction:[/b][/size]
This mod’s main goal is to enhance combat with new animations and effects. Make NPCs die in various ways depending on the cause of the death. Mod is still under development. Current version 1.0 includes following features:

-	dismemberment, possible to cut off arms with any melee weapon
-	crushing skull with mace or two handed hammer power attack
-	cut in half with two handed sword or axe power attack
-	fire will leave burned corpses and keep burning much longer
-	frost will freeze enemies in the block of ice that can be smashed in pieces.

[size=3][b]Useful information and functionality:[/b][/size]
-	Works for all NPCs of all humanoid races except old people, children and essential.
-	Player is also affected. Exception : cut in half and dismemberment.
-	Cut in half and dismemberment may occur only on NPCs wearing one of the supported armors such as
[i]
Fur armor,
Elven armor,
Forsworn armor,
Hide armor,
Studded armor,
Imperial armor,
Iron armor,
Stormcloak armor and city guards variations,
Necromancer robe,
Warlock robe[/i]

-	Head crush works on any character
-	Some of the effects can stack and replace one each other.
-	Bodies cut in half, dismembered or smashed in pieces can not be reanimated.
-	Supports Werewolf attacks.
-	Any NPC equipped with matching weapon or spell can do it.

[size=3][b]How it works : [/b][/size]
The chance of the mutilation occurs is based on the average of the One handed and Two handed skills. Basically when starting a new game it equals 20 – 25 % as your skills are. And will grow as you progress and reach 100% when you have both one handed and two handed skills maximum.
***You can change it through MCM configuration menu. Magic is not affected by random chance and works all the time if possible.

[size=3][b]Requirements:[/b][/size]
[size=3][color=yellow][u]SKSE[/u][/color][/size]
[size=3][color=yellow][u]SkyUI 3.4 [/u][/color][/size]

[size=3][b]Installation : [/b][/size]
1.	Go to isolated(preferably interior) place with no NPC around dead or alive. Also fire your follower or leave him/her outside.
2.	Save game
3.	Copy files in your Skyrim “Data” folder or use Mod Manager. 
4.	Run Skyrim and save game again.
5.	Enjoy

[size=3][b]FAQ:[/b][/size]
	[b]Q: [/b]Actors die without any reason as soon as they hit me.
	[b]A:[/b]Go to mod’s MCM configuration menu and do “Reset player effect”.

	[b]Q:[/b]It doesn’t work.
	[b]A:[/b]Mod will be automatically applied on all new coming characters, but it will effect already existing NPCs later. After NPC was reset and reloaded. Simply travel far enough , it should be good at your return. Still not working? Make sure you have all files copied where they should. Try to reinstall it manually. Still nothing? Track down the incompatibilities.

[size=3][b]Performances[/b][/size]
This mod will NOT cause a serious FPS drop but high performance configuration is recommended. 

[size=3][b]Compatibility[/b][/size]
-Compatible with Dance of death
-Supports alternative blood and decals textures. 
-Works with custom weapons and spells.
-Deadly Mutilation does not replace any meshes or textures. But may not fit to modified vanilla armor and body meshes.
-Supports Realistic ragdolls and XP32 skeletons. Compatibility patch can be found here

 [size=3][b]Non compatible[/b][/size]
-Will conflict with any mod replacing skeleton. Don’t even try, game will simply crush if using improper skeleton.
-May conflict with mods modifying races. In that case be sure to put Deadly Mutilation at the end of the load order.
-Incompatible with “Burn Freeze Shock Effects”


[size=3][b]Known bugs[/b][/size]
-NPC wearing suit covering all body and head such as Thalmors robe, will end up butt naked upon head crush.
-Remains of the bodies may stuck floating in the air when game loaded. Reload you save game right away should fix that and make it fall to the ground as it should.
-Burned corpses are skinned in a rush. Raised as zombies they will look weird while holding weapons.
-Sometimes crushed scull may remain stick together.

[size=3][b]Credits and contributions [/b][/size]
Alternative skeletons pack by [i]skulltyrant[/i]

[size=3][b]Permissions [/b][/size]
All the assets in this file belong to the author. You MUST contact me and obtain my explicit permission before re-upload, modify or use any of the assets.
author: Lamer1000

files.name: Deadly Mutilation
files.changelogHtml:
Entirely reworked, optimized and improved script core system.
Significant improvement of the performances and reaction time
Mutilation no longer happens simply when NPC dies. It will happen randomly, based on the luck, skill, and victim’s health remaining and actually become a cause of the death.
Better support of the kill moves and compatibility with Dance of death. Mutilation now can run at the same time while in kill move.
Added support for Beast form. Now Werewolves can do all that any weapon can.
Added power attack condition for trigger cut in half and head crush.
Added dismemberment possibility with any melee weapon.
No more fake actors fading in upon cut in half. Low body is now the part of the victim and will appear instantly and be affected by the force and direction of the hit.
Fixed Khajiits, Argonians tail problem

files.name: Realistic Ragdolls and Force compatible skeletons
files.fileName: Realistic Ragdolls and Force compatible skeletons-31944-.7z

files.name: Deadly Mutilation v0_91a
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed freeze, burn and destruction skill gain issues
Added optional plugin v0.91b removing all effect from player

files.name: Deadly Mutilation v1_0
files.changelogHtml:
Added dismemberment for all already supported armors.
Added shader effect for transition between burning body and charred corpse.
Modified charred corps texture set. (Sharper, darker and some other tweaks)
Reworked and optimized all mehses. Now supporting corpulence morphs.
Added "Reset player effects" button in mod's configuration menu.
